sentences.en: Seven second-class passengers prepared to disembark.
sentences.cn: 7名二等舱的旅客准备下船了。

sentences.en: First-class passengers enjoy "élite" security lines and priority boarding, and disembark before the unwashed in coach, held at bay by a flight attendant, are allowed to foul the jet-way.
sentences.cn: 头等舱乘客享受“精英”安检通道，能优先登机，并能在被空乘人员管辖的经济舱普通民众“弄脏”移动通道之前，优先下飞机。

sentences.en: It is still unclear whether they will disembark at all.
sentences.cn: 他们到底会不会上岸还不清楚。
